topic.title: Using the DTA Basic Format Schema

section.title: Availability of the Schema
section.p: The Relax NG Schema of the DTA basic format is located at: http://www.deutschestextarchiv.de/basisformat.rng.
The underlying ODD file is located at: http://www.deutschestextarchiv.de/basisformat.odd.
The associated complementary Schematron rule set is available at the following address: http://www.deutschestextarchiv.de/basisformat.sch.

section.title: Static vs. Current Schema
section.p: The DTA basic format is largely stable in its specification. However, there are still changes that may not be downward compatible, i. e. documents that have once been validated against the DTA basic format schema at http://www.deutschestextarchiv.de/basisformat.rng do not always guarantee to validate against this schema. Therefore, it may be useful to save a local copy of the schema and reference it in the XML sources.

section.p: The oXygen-XML-Editor validates the documents directly during editing against the respective included schema and issues corresponding error messages in case of validation problems.
